genmean: Anything of this general shape (a tick or wide rectangular shape on a horizontal plane), or any thing or any action directly or indirectly associated with this, such as a barrier, wall or moat, and especially a verandah.
oldentry: Popular explanation: the outline of a verandah.
nomlex: 1. A platform along the outside walls of a house with a roof supported by pillars. English = verandah.
